MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:28pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Dunbeth substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:54pm on Sunday, 15 November 2020
